from .kern import Kern
import numpy as np
from ...core.parameterization import Param
from paramz.transformations import Logexp
from paramz.caching import Cache_this

class Static(Kern):
    def __init__(self, input_dim, variance, active_dims, name):
        super(Static, self).__init__(input_dim, active_dims, name)
        self.variance = variance
        self.cache = Cache_this(self)
        self.param = Param(self, "variance", Logexp(self.variance, self.input_dim, self.active_dims))

from .kern import Kern
import numpy as np
from ...core.parameterization import Param
from paramz.transformations import Logexp
from paramz.caching import Cache_this

class Static(Kern):
    def __init__(self, input_dim, variance, active_dims, name):
        super(Static, self).__init__(input_dim, active_dims, name)
        self.kern = Logexp(
            np.logspace(0, 1, 10),
            Logexp.exp_range_to_log_range(input_dim, name)
        )
        self
